metadata.title: CVE-2014-7275 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The POP3-over-SSL implementation in getmail 4.0.0 through 4.44.0 does notverify X.509 certificates from SSL servers, which allows man-in-the-middleattackers to spoof POP3 servers and obtain sensitive information via acrafted certificate.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-7275` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

getmail4 - 4.46.0-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: getmail4 package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.46.0-1').
